text: 5|105|satyavisvasikale, ninnal ninnalute karyannal srad'dhicc kealluka. ninnal sanmargam prapiccittuntenkil valipilaccavar ninnalkkearu dreahavum varuttukayilla. allahuvinkalekkatre ninnaluteyellam matakkam. ninnal ceyt keantirikkunnatinepparriyellam appeal avan ninnale vivaramariyikkunnatanâ€Œ
